alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 1:29PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas around and including the cities of Page, Lees Ferry, Grand Canyon Village, Supai, North Rim, Cottonwood, Camp Verde, Cordes Junction, Bagdad, and Sedona. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow above 5500 feet is likely from this evening into early Wednesday morning. These conditions will result in periods of significantly reduced visibility on roads in this time period.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
